Description: Model NameC-1 SpecialItem Number795Guitar ColorsSatin Gold (SGLD)DexterityRight HandedCountry of OriginIndonesiaConstructionBolt-onBody MaterialMahoganyTop ContourArched TopBindingBlack 1-plyNeck MaterialMapleFretboard MaterialRosewoodInlaysPearloid DotsScale25.5” (648mm)Frets24 X-JumboFretboard Radius14” (355mm)Neck ShapeThin ‘C’Thickness@ 1st Fret- .787” (20mm)/ @ 12th Fret- .866” (22mm)Nut Width1.653” (42mm)NutGraph Tech XL Black TusqTruss Rod2-Way Adjustable Rod w/ 5/32” (4mm) Allen NutBridge PickupDuncan Designed HB-102BNeck PickupDuncan Designed HB 101NControlsVolume/Tone (Push-Pull)/3-Way SwitchHardware ColorBlackBridgeTune-O-Matic w/ String Thru BodyTunersSchecterKnobsMetal Knurled w/ Set Screwincludes padded cloth guitar bag The Schecter C-1 SPECIAL is an amazing deal. It brings an extensive list of features within reach of almost any budget. The mahogany body is beautifully sculpted and available in some eye-catching finishes that belie this guitar's price point. The bolt-on maple neck is designed for speed and playing ease with a comfortable fretboard radius and 24 extra-jumbo frets. Powerful Duncan Designed pickups are wired to a master volume and a push/pull tone control for coil-tapping and rapid tone-tweaking. A string-thru-body bridge system adds sustain while making intonation adjustments a snap.
Title: Schecter C-1 Special Satin Gold MINT
ConditionDescription: Lightly used Schecter electric. Satin gold body. Excellent condition.
